alert.note: Alert for Northern Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 21 at 3:44PM EST until December 22 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Wintry mix including sleet and freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulation of a light glaze. * WHERE...In Vermont, Western Windham and Eastern Windham Counties. In Connecticut, Northern Litchfield County. In Massachusetts, Northern Berkshire and Southern Berkshire Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery travel conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
